## Quarto

```{r}
library(dplyr)

```

```{r}

rural_urban_class <- read_csv("../data/rural_urban_class.csv")
```

```{r}
test <- rural_urban_class %>%
  filter(fromYear == 2010) %>%
  add_social_vuln_index(Year.colum = "fromYear",
                        path_to_svi = "../data/08_svi/svi_lookup_table.csv")
```

```{r}
with(test,
     {
      table(rural_urban_class, svi_bin) 
     })

```
